info.task: navigate backwards to a heading inside a main landmark
info.title: Navigate backwards to a heading inside a main landmark

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterMain
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the main landmark

user: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Main Landmark' heading.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Main Landmark' heading.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name of the heading, 'Main Landmark', is conveyed
